title: anbu nilaiyai
sahitya:
anbu nilaiyaik-kaNDAl nambu manamE nI ANDavanaik-kaNDiDuvAi inba manamE


anupallavi

  tunbamellAm tolaiyum tUya manamE donda bandhangaLellAm sindi ozhiyum


caraNam 1    mantirattil vaNanginum vETrumai illai masUdiyilE vaNanginum vETrumai illai
enda dishai vaNanginum vETrumai illai ellAmum kaDavuL irukkumiDamE
    caraNam 2    pirivinai pEshAdE pEdai manamE peyaril mayangAdE piLLai manamE
arivinai vaLarttiDin Ashai manamE ahamum puramum shuddhAnma mayamE
